alert.note: Alert for Brown; Day; Edmunds; Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Marshall; McPherson; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 9:40AM MST until November 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of one quarter to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Day; Edmunds; Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Marshall; McPherson; Spink
